pages.title: Introduction
pages.summary: What Tal3nt is and why the protocol exists.
pages.content:
# Tal3nt Documentation
Tal3nt is the talent and work coordination layer for on-chain organizations.

## Why Tal3nt
- Trust-minimized escrow powered by the Tal3nt Escrow smart contract.
- Composable reputation for contributors via on-chain attestations.
- Integrated admin tools for talent operators and guild leads.

## Core Pillars
1. **Opportunities** — Curated bounties and roles sourced from audited teams.
2. **Credentials** — Work proof NFTs that can travel across ecosystems.
3. **Payments** — Programmatic payouts settled in stable crypto and wrapped assets.

Continue with the rest of this guide to learn how to integrate Tal3nt into your workflow.

# Smart Contracts
The Tal3nt Escrow contract powers milestone-based payouts.

```solidity
function fundJob(string jobId) external payable;
function completeJobAndReleaseFunds(string jobId, address recipient, string title, string description, string imageUrl) external;
```

### Network Configuration
| Chain | Chain ID | RPC |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Monad Testnet | 0x279F | https://testnet-rpc.monad.xyz |

Use the ABI shared in the main Tal3nt app for integration.
